嶪嶪嶪

嶪字的基本解释

嶪
yè
〔岌嶪〕又作“嶪岌”，高峻，如“状巍峨以嶪嶪。”
形容声响巨大。

嶪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》魚怯切，入業，疑。］
亦作“嶫1”。
高耸貌。

嶪字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶪； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页320第19
【廣韻】【正韻】魚怯切【集韻】逆怯切【韻會】疑輒切，?音業。岌嶪，山高貌。【張衡·西京賦】狀嵬峩以岌嶪。【註】岌嶪，高壯貌。【杜甫·九成宮詩】岌嶪土囊口。　【集韻】或作礏。亦作嶫。【何晏·景福殿賦】峨峨嶫嶫。

嶪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嶪字的起名意思

形容高峻，高耸的样子，也形容响声巨大。

嶪
Basic explanation of words
嶪
yè
〔岌嶪〕It is also called "嶪岌", tall and steep, such as "the shape is towering to the 嶪嶪."
Describe the sound is huge.
嶪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guangyun" fish is timid, enters the industry, suspicious. ]
Also known as "嶫1".
Towering appearance.
嶪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶪; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 320 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Fish Cowardly Cut [Jiyun] Reverse Cowardly Cut [Yunhui] Suspected Cut, Sound Industry. Huge, high mountain appearance. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Zhuangweiwei Yiweiwei. [Note] It is sluggish, tall and strong. 【Du Fu · Jiucheng Palace Poetry】The mouth of the sacred soil.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo Lun. Also known as 嶫. 【He Yan·Jingfu Palace Fu】E'e 嶫嶫.
嶪
Source glyph

Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
嶪
Name meaning
Describes a tall, towering appearance, and also describes a loud noise.
yè
см. 岌嶪
